attributes.action: Introduce a huge incentive to any individual or manufacturer to introduce a motor engine suitable for a public vehicle which does not rely on fossil fuels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The engine should be required to be powerful enough to be 

used in motorbikes, cars, vans & trucks and have no 

reliance on any kind of energy derived from fossil fuels. This would exclude the use of electric vehicles which can be charged from fossil fuel derived energy sources.

It should be the primary purpose of government to encourage such ventures.
